test.name: SecretMMS.TC.007
test.description:
Validate Application sends an SMS Message to Sender if the recipient is not associated with password - Application drops the MMS Message / Validate SMS Message has a proper default contains in any language Russian must be supported. Test Category: MUST Test Steps: --------------------------------------------------------------- Scenario # 1: 1. Login to the MMS Extra Management portal. 2. Validate a recipient who is not associated with the password from the database. 3. Sender sends the MMS to the recipient whoes secret is not associated with him. 4. Application validates the sender recipient information from the database and identifies this MMS as Secret. 5. Since the Recipient does not have any password associated with the sender the submition of the MMS will be rejected.
